snippet.title: Amber Heard Under Investigation
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Under Investigation
______________________________________________
For more videos subscribe : https://bit.ly/2zoPgqj
______________________________________________
Amber Heard could face perjury charges in the wake of the Pistol and Boo debacle in 2016 after details of the incident were found in the defamation case of her ex-husband Johnny Depp against The Sun. But before we get to the video, if you like my video, please like and leave a comment so that the YouTube algorithm can catch up on it and suggest it to more people. Let's get started.

The messy saga of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp's divorce continues. In the latest development, it is claimed that the Aquaman actress is now under investigation by the Los Angeles Police Department for perjury, and faces jail if convicted, regarding the 2016 incident in which Depp allegedly struck. his then wife in the face.

Whether or not that actually happened was the fuel for the former couple's many legal battles over the next several years. According to the German site BILD, the Los Angeles Police Department is examining Heard's claims to make sure she has not falsified any information about the physical altercation that allegedly took place. L'avocat de Depp, Adam Waldman, a fait une declaration au point de vente confirming that the request is in course and formulated of series allÃ©gations de sa part contre Heard au cours du processus, affirming that the avait  «mis en scÃ¨ne " everything.

Heard accused her ex-husband of throwing a phone in her face during the aforementioned occasion and looting her attic, including spilling red wine on the walls and carpet. Depp's legal team says the first two officers to arrive on the scene say they have no recollection of seeing such spills and that there was no visual evidence of a crime.

"Amber Heard and her friend Rocky Pennington set up the May 21 crime scene to prove the abuse allegation against Johnny Depp," Waldman told BILD. The attorney then addressed newly presented evidence, LAPD body camera recordings, and office testimony that responded to the scene, which apparently contradicted Heard's own recollections of the event. This, Depp's attorney believes, proves that "the crime scene was a big lie."

The actress is currently under investigation by the Department of Agriculture, Water and Environment after a former Depp employee told the court that he was forced to lie under oath regarding the illegal entry of his dogs. to Queensland.

A department spokesman told news.com.au on Wednesday: "The department is investigating whether criminal offenses have been committed under Commonwealth law in connection with the testimony provided to the High Court in London. Due to the nature of these surveys, they can't provide a timeline. "

The maximum penalty for perjury in Queensland is 14 years in prison.

Heard became embroiled in one of the strangest political scandals in history four years ago after joining her then-husband on Queensland's Gold Coast on a private jet, with dogs in tow, while filming Pirates of the Caribbean. It was the same trip that the couple had a brutal argument that ended with Depp's finger breaking. Heard alleged the actor "held her hostage" for three days amid drug-fueled rage. Depp denied being physically abusive.

The 34-year-old Aquaman star avoided conviction in the Pistol and Boo case in April 2016, saying she was unaware that the correct documents had not been produced prior to her arrival. She was later forced by then-Deputy Prime Minister Barnaby Joyce to film a biosecurity apology video alongside Depp. She was also slapped with a $ 1,000 fine. Heard denied asking the employees to lie, and Was claimed Johnny Depp "was also involved" in the decision to bring the dogs to Australia.

And that's it for today's video. Express your thoughts in the comment section below. If you haven't signed in to my channel yet, please do so. See you in the next video.

______________________________________________
About My Channel :
Welcome to the Viral Flash! In this channel we upload videos related to celebrity gossip, entertainment news, top 10 list videos, updates on royal family etc. As far as possible, we upload 4 videos each week. Thanks for watching!
__________________________________________________
